name: #4 Just Cookie Jules
description:
This recipe was created for a dear friend, who loves vaping a vanilla cinnamon cookie more than anything else. I just couldn't resist and  had to add a bit of (FA) Almond to it. 

My friend  just jumps right at it as a S&V. I would recommend a week tho, so the flavors can really come together. 

Any comments, suggestions and additions are highly appreciated. 
Have fun!
author: Evilin

reviews.text: It would have been a solid cookie without the almond, but the almond is a very nice touch.
